name: iconic-visibility
objective: Connman icon is visible in the gnome status bar
description: The connman status icon should be visible in the top bar

steps.description: From the desktop, check the top bar
steps.expected: The connman status icon is visible

author: jb

name: menu-conforms
description: The connman quick functionality menu should be shown when clicking the connman status icon of the top bar.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the connman status icon

steps.expected: the menus shows switch for available devices (Wired, Wifi, Bluetooth, 3G, ...)
the menus shows switch for available devices (Wired, Wifi, Bluetooth, 3G, ...)
the available networks (if any) are displayed with their status

author: jb

name: wifi-scan
description: in the connman panel, activate wifi and check that hotspots are discovered and displayed

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the connman status icon
Check that wifi networks are detected
steps.expected: the available wifi networks are displayed

author: jb

name: connect
objective: connman can connect to a network
description: in connman panel, select a network, check that it connects well

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the connman status icon
Ask to connect to an available network

author: jb

name: disconnect
objective: connman can disconnect from a network
description: in connman panel, select a network, check that it disconnects well

steps.description: From the desktop, click on the connman status icon
Ask to connect from a connected network

author: jb
